activities: Arena Pharmaceuticals, Inc., receives personal information from the European Economic Area/European Union member countries and Switzerland. This includes: (1) personal data received in the course of Arena's activities, including communicating with customers, collaborators, Arena's Swiss subsidiary (Arena Pharmaceuticals GmbH), and vendors; involvement in studies and clinical trials; providing various business services; enabling sales and other transactions; conducting data analysis to improve products and services; providing business, technical, and computing support to Arena Pharmaceuticals GmbH; and/or establishing and maintaining collaborations; and (2) human resources data regarding Arena employees and Arena Pharmaceuticals GmbH’s employees.
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organizational, client, customer, human resources, clinical research and development, pharmacovigilance, collaborator, patient and vendor data
